content.rendered:
Directed by Tarun Sudhir

Written by M Chandramouli. Tarun Sudhir

Cast Darshan Thoogudeep(Raghava / Roberrt). Vinod Prabhakar(Raghava). Asha Bhat(Amrutha). Jagapathi Babu(Nana). Ashok(Vishwanatha Bhat). Avinash(Omkar Shukla). Ravi Chethan(Chandra Mouli). Jason D’Souza(Arjun). Devaraj(Sathyadev Alva). Chandu Gowda(Kishan Tripati). Harsha(Harshavardhan). Manjunath Hegde(Nana’s Lawyer).Md Ariful Islam. Ravi Kishan(Balram Tripathi). Uturn Krishna(Bride’s Father). Sonal Monteiro(Thanu). Amit Shivdas Nair(James Sniper).Naveen D. Padil. Ananth Padmanabha(Comicroll in marriage). Aishwarya Prasad(Kamala). Suchendra Prasadh(Thanu’s Father). Sridhar Rao(Lallan Bhayya). P. Ravi Shankar(Sarkar). Dilip Shetty(Cherry).Rakshith Ramachandra Shetty. Etv Shridhar(CEO). Cockroach Sudhi((as Sudhir)). Thejaswini(Bride)

Languages Kannada. Telugu

Producers Sundeep Bhardwaj. Eiqbal Jaafri. Zafar Khan. Umapathy Srinivas.

Production Umapathy Films
